about_the_game:
Authentic tropical beach experience


Enjoy a tropical resort of your dreams and play one of the most loved sports games but this time in virtual reality. There is no place like this one where you can chill out and have fun for hours. Let yourself free your mind and get excited while scoring goals against the opponent and improving your skills.

Realistic physics


Tropical Air Hockey VR provides a real-life experience. It offers realistic physics, complex AI opponents, and an immersive experience. We have spiced it up a little bit with fantastic arcade elements, just to amplify your unique gaming experience.

Spice it up!


If classic air hockey is not your style, you can spice up the gameplay with powerups. enlarge your opponent's goal, make your striker bigger, increase the force of your strike or spawn unique characters that enrich the experience and act as unique strikers.

Relax while scoring some juicy points


It’s cocktail time! Refresh yourself and immerse in a relaxing brick breaker-like experience that transforms your table into a tropical cocktail spawning machine. Satisfyingly crash the cocktails with the puck to score points and climb the leaderboards!

What goes great with air hockey?


Pinball! Not the first thought that comes to your mind, but it sure will once you experience this mashup of pinball VR game and air hockey in a high score chasing frenzy.



Whichever of these gaming modes you choose, one is for sure - you will have a fantastic VR experience. This amazing sports game will warm up your heart and chill out your mind at the same time. Enjoy it yourself or call your friends and see who is going to have the best score. Have fun!

name: Tropical Air Hockey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce® GTX 980, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-3770 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 equivalent or greater

short_description: Air Hockey game provides you with the best VR experience! Feel like you are on a lovely tropical beach. Have fun and chill out playing this addicting arcade game. If you like classical air hockey, you will love this one even more!
